meanings.definition: A type of playing card used in tarot card games.
meanings.sent1: During the game, I drew a taroc and won the round.
meanings.sent2: She shuffled the deck and picked a taroc to start the game.
meanings.sent3: The taroc looked mischievous as it peeked out from the deck.
meanings.sent4: His fate seemed to be written on the taroc he drew.
meanings.sent5: The colorful taroc stood out among the other cards.

meanings.definition: To predict the future using tarot cards.
meanings.sent1: I will taroc your future and tell you what lies ahead.
meanings.sent2: She likes to taroc for her friends during gatherings.
meanings.sent3: He tried to taroc the weather for the weekend, but failed hilariously.
meanings.sent4: The old lady seemed to taroc with uncanny accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The fortune teller will taroc your destiny with the cards.

meanings.definition: A person who reads tarot cards for others.
meanings.sent1: The taroc at the fair predicted a bright future for me.
meanings.sent2: She consulted the taroc to gain insights into her life.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious taroc wore a cloak of many colors.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the most accurate taroc in town.
meanings.sent5: The taroc's readings were always sought after by many.
